content: Aw snowflake. Not tough enough to handle a little bit of diversity? Majority of jihadis came back on Harper’s watch not Trudeau’s. We were safe then and we are safe now. Educate yourself.,https://,twitter.com/justinlwatson/,status/958115105719296000, ,…

Diversity will be the death of us all. Is Japan diverse? China? Saudi Arabia? South Korea? Why don't they have to be diverse? Us white folks are a world wide minority and getting smaller every day. These people refuse to integrate and assimilate. Hope you enjoy loud booms
Is that what you are teaching your kids?

I'm teaching him what he needs to know to survive... namely liberals will kill us all. He learns how it is at school though, he is treated as a second class citizen next to his Somalian classmates, bullied, pushed, picked on... teachers do nothing to prevent it.

Maybe he is getting pick on because he has inherited his dad's racist and narrow minded personality. Teach them to love not hate , raised 3 kids and had plenty of very diverse birthday party guest and the kids were just kids no matter ethnicity.
Racist? Nah, I don't really care about race... it's culture I care about, and a lot of other cultures aren't compatible with ours. True story bro.
You clearly stated it bothered you that "white people are a minority" how is this not about race?

Besides, us white folks are the most diverse people out there. Red, black, brown, blonde, different shades. Blue, green brown hazel grey various shades. Everyone else black hair. Brown eyes. Not very diverse is It? I can handle diversity just fine, but you can't I'm guessing BOOM
